context: I am doing great! How are you?
Can I recommend any movies for you? What kind do you like?

resp: Comedy then? I have a few ideas. The Other Guys (2010) also has Will Ferrell and is pretty good.

Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I enjoy humorous and entertaining flicks, emotional and thought-provoking dramas, and romantic and heartwarming love stories. Do you have any recommendations that cover these genres?
context.feelings: I love unexpected movie recommendations that bring excitement to my movie-watching experience. I hope the recommender suggests something unique and enjoyable. Let's see what they come up with.

context.content: Have you seen The Proposal (2009)? It's a great movie about a diabetic boy who loses his memory every day.
Hmm, that sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about The Proposal (2009)?
context.feelings: This movie doesn't seem to match my preferences at all. I'm looking for something more light-hearted and romantic. I appreciate the effort, but I'll have to pass on this recommendation. I hope the next one will be a better fit for me.
